已过时的 API

目录

  • 方法
  • 方法 
    方法 说明
    org.elasticsearch.client.RestClient.performRequest​(String, String, Header...)
    prefer RestClient.performRequest(Request)
    org.elasticsearch.client.RestClient.performRequestAsync​(String, String, ResponseListener, Header...)
    prefer RestClient.performRequestAsync(Request, ResponseListener)
    org.elasticsearch.client.RestClient.setHosts​(HttpHost...)
    prefer RestClient.setNodes(Collection) because it allows you to set metadata for use with NodeSelectors
    org.elasticsearch.client.RestClientBuilder.setMaxRetryTimeoutMillis​(int)
    this setting is deprecated and will be removed in the future in favour of relying on socket and connect timeout
